amendatorysection.catchline: Annexation; assessments, fines, licenses, fees, claims, demands; paid to and collection by city of the first class.
amendatorysection.para: All taxes, assessments, fines, licenses, fees, claims, and demands of every kind assessed or levied against persons or property within any such village or second-class city so annexed, shall be paid to and collected by such city of the first class.
